entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error: Assert failed: Expected Promise for GCHandle #98721
    9.0.0
  • [JITstressregs]: System.Numerics.Tensors tests SingleGenericTensorPrimitives and DoubleGenericTensorPrimitives failing #98718
  • [JitRandom/arm64] HardwareIntrinsics_Arm_r failing #98717
  • ApplicationSettingsBase.Upgrade() throws ArgumentNullException when run under fresh new user in macOS #98715
  • Math.FusedMultiplyAdd returns wrong results on systems without FMA3 support #98704
  • JsonConsoleFormatter memory optimization opportunity #98702
  • [mono][perf] Explore possibility of using SuperPMI for Mono runtime #98697
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SM4 #98696
  • Calling DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo makes default Gregorian calendar readonly #98694
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SHA3 #98692
  • HttpClient.GetAsync(...) throws Win32Exception when request sent first to https://FQDN and then to https://FQDN:8000 #98691
  • [browser] Publish not always correctly incremental #98690
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: PLINQ: add `ParallelEnumerable` extensions from `Enumerable` #98689
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 2/12/2024 12:30:28 AM #98708
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions on 2/16/2024 1:14:41 AM #98707
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regressions on 2/14/2024 8:50:48 AM #98706
  • Performance changes related to vzeroupper emit changes #98705
  • ARM32 native AOT fails to link on Raspberry Pi #98688
  • Improve regex source generator optimization collision between alternations and repetitions #98683
    9.0.0

Closed

  • ilc crashes on invalid Get #98703
  • [TestFailure] System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.DefaultConnect_EndToEnd_Ok #96689
  • ConfigurationBindingGenerator generates code that does not compile #98713
    9.0.0
  • The SocketsHttpHandler cannot authenticate NTLM with the username format domain\samAccountName #97691
  • NuGet.Configuration.NuGetConfigurationException : NuGet.Config is not valid XML #98014
  • BigInteger produces wrong output for polynomials with order greater than 9. #98709
  • Crash related to GC: help interpreting stacktrace #97661
  • PAL tests broken again after another PAL refactoring #98574
    9.0.0
  • Why does this code always print `0.000000`? #98693
  • Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/loader.c:1638, condition `id <= GPOINTER_TO_UINT (*data)' not met #93687
  • System.ExecutionEngineException: Attempting to JIT compile method '(wrapper runtime-invoke) object <Module>:runtime_invoke_void_CGRect_CGRect_single (object,intptr,intptr,intptr)' while running in aot-only mode. #96063
  • Swift interop tests fail to build for NativeAOT #98611
  • ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory uses backslashes (\) for directory seperation, even on Linux #98247
  • AOT之后的软件怎么暴漏一些参数给vmp软件,让vmp自动选择加密的函数 #98645
  • illink - Task host node exited prematurely #92951
  • Cannot reestablish communication with serial device through SerialPort #93599
  • `Type.GetType` throws when passed `Program&&` #98426
    9.0.0
  • DWARF errors with `nm` on linux-musl #98377
  • HTTP2: Rework existing loopback-based tests to be protocol version neutral, where applicable #28352
    Future
  • CryptographicException with app crash when signing XML using System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #97242

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #98726
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Return null for ECDSA keys from GetECDiffieHellmanPrivateKey #98725
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Bump NuGet.ProjectModel version #98724
    area-Infrastructure
  • Improve alternation switch optimization in regex source generator #98723
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64_SVE: Add IF_SVE_BR_3A to IF_SVE_EX_3A #98722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add back optimization of Encode using arm64 load/store/vectortablelookup #98719
    needs-area-label
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono] Intrinsify StoreSelectedScalar #98710
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][interp] Allocate basic block link array in exponential fashion #98701
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Intrinsify ClearWithoutReferences and Fill #98700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix FormatQuantiles formatting in MetricsEventSource #98699
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Fix profiler multiple test #98685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Console.ReadKey should not throw when read returns 0 records #98684
    area-System.Console
  • JIT: Remove GenTreeBlk::BlkOpKindHelper #98682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HY_3A` to `SVE_IB_3A` #98468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Reorder validation of instantiation length #98720
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Bump Pkcs servicing version to 4 #98716
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][wasm] Fix a performance regression introduced by #97096. #98515
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Use successor edges instead of block targets for BBJ_SWITCH #98671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Bump Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility to servicing version 8 #98711
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.28
  • Expand String.EndsWith/MemoryExtensions.EndsWith in JIT #98593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] EABI: Specify Tag_ABI_VFP_args #98698
    arch-arm32, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect cref's in MetricsBuilderExtensions #98670
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Fix PAL tests - remove non-existent tests from the list #98695
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix a bug in PAL version of _vsnprint_f #98687
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Wrong IEquatable<T?> interface #98680
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NativeAOT] Fix cut & paste errors #98686
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable building Swift interop tests on macOS with Native AOT #98667
    os-mac-os-x, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Propagate DotNetBuildOrchestrator #98660
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix NativeAOT publish failure on fi_FI culture (#98552) #98601
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • Improve Half conversion test coverage #98642
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Revert "[NativeAOT] Add null checks into memcpy/memset helpers" #98681
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete MemoryHelpers.Memset #98615
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] fix GC boundaries #98678
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • ObjWriter: Do not generate relocations within .debug_info for DW_AT_type #98597
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [no merge] Draft: infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] deputy #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add a unified mechanism to track metadata/metrics about the compilation #98653
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fold more casts #98528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] cleanup #98672
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Use the same code to emit Vector/Vector<T> intrinsics on … #98317
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Support storing Swift error register value to SwiftError struct #98586
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • #98441 - Ignore invalid handle/access when setting console cp #98641
    area-System.Console
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] pinvoke improvements part 2 #98250
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Move memset/memcpy helpers to managed impl #98623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • ObjWriter: Place unboxing section along other TEXT sections #97960
    os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cse new candidate strategy #98467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't call user callbacks on MsQuic worker thread. #98361
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #98456
    area-codeflow
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update diasymreader to 17.8.7-beta1.24113.1 #98539
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • Update linux musl arm32 helix image to Alpine 3.17 #98531
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Optimize equality operators #98196
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Proposed fix for issue XSLT extension methods format-date & format-time #97402
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Privately expose MsQuic performance counters #98422
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_CE,CF #98409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Refactor the generic TensorPrimitives implementation into multiple files. #98566
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Don't allow relink duplicates of `dotnet.native.worker.js` #98487
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Enable new exception handling by default #98570
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add missing type name parsing test coverage #98562
    area-System.Reflection
  • Vector64: Avoid GSCookies in Vector64 software fallback #98293
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Convert fast path of ValueType.GetHashCode to managed #97590
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [browser] Fix switching between single and multi threaded runtimes without clean #98607
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threading SignalR in Blazor WBT #98343
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Add ProducesNetCoreAssets property to Publishing.props #98665
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add some linux-arm test coverage #98022
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove DAM from design-time attributes #98378
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Check DivideByZeroException before generating check for unsigned div/mod #98648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • #98551 - Regression in DI scope validation #98661
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Expanded & clarified BerConverter tests #98676
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Revise compiler hardening options on Unix #98622
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix some comments on interfaces in `System.Numerics` #98398
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/6.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98385
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http
